Paek Nam Sun meets EU delegation
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets EU delegation 
   Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met and had a talk with the EU delegation led by Dominique Girard, director for Asia of the French Foreign Ministry, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
